title: My client seems weird and I can't see everything (can't change region)
body: Just want to be able to change region...

replies.body:
Hey there!

This is a known issue (that we're working on fixing) but there is a workaround available [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/EUtaI4IW-patcher-window-wrong-size-after-420).
